column4: hi guys, I have Ubuntu and just installed emacs. When I run emacs command in the terminal a GUI emacs starts. Is emacs a GUI text editor? I thought it's cli
most developers use it in cli mode, right? like vim
I use it in gui myself, http://www.flickr.com/photos/myrtti/2867071011/ (though I don't develop that much stuff) - it's up to your own personal preference
your screenshots on Flickr are great
how did you try Textmate then?
